text: You are in a dark room. You can't see anything.
"You find a door and open it, revealing a dimly lit hallway."

"You explore the hallway and find a locked door at the end. A note on the ground reads 'The key is in room B4.' You continue down the hallway and come across another door with a glowing green symbol above it. As you approach, the door opens automatically and reveals a hidden chamber filled with treasure."

"You check for traps or hidden mechanisms and find that there are pressure plates along the floor of the hallway. Carefully avoiding them, you make your way to the end of the hallway where you discover a secret room containing an ancient artifact."

"You quickly close the door behind you and hear muffled voices outside. You realize that you've inadvertently locked yourself inside this dimly lit hallway. As you turn around, you notice a small key on the ground next to the door you just closed. With relief, you pick it up and use it to unlock the original door."
"No one responds to your cries for help, but you hear the distant sound of water dripping."

choices.text: "Investigate the source of the dripping sound."
"Wait quietly to see if anyone approaches."

text: "You discover an underground waterfall, its beauty soothing your fear."
"No one responds to your second call for help, but you hear a rustling in the bushes nearby."
"A group of adventurers appears out of nowhere and rescues you from danger."
"After waiting in silence, you slowly begin to make out shapes in the room as your eyes adjust to the darkness."

choices.text: "Feel around the room with your hands."
